## cdk-rest-api-with-spec package

Describe the Amazon API Gateway and OpenAPI definition at once with CDK.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[ParameterKey](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.parameterkey.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Parsed request or response parameter key.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[RestApiWithSpec](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.restapiwithspec.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** CDK construct that provisions an API Gateway REST API endpoint and also synthesizes the OpenAPI definition for it.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[augmentAuthorizer(authorizer, securitySchemeObject)](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.augmentauthorizer.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Makes a given [aws\_apigateway.IAuthorizer](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cdk/api/v2/docs/aws-cdk-lib.aws_apigateway.IAuthorizer.html) an [IAuthorizerWithSpec](./cdk-rest-api-with-spec.iauthorizerwithspec.md) by augmenting it with a specified security scheme object.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
